html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-01762023-02-22GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add seven (7) individuals and fifty (50) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; (2) add an export prohibition on certain chemicals primed for use in electronic devices that could be used in weapons; and (3) impose a ban on importing, purchasing, acquiring or shipping any and all Russian arms, ammunition and other weapons, including hunting knives and air rifles into Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0032 Publication Date: 2023-03-15
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add seven (7) individuals and fifty (50) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs; (2) add an export prohibition on certain chemicals primed for use in electronic devices that could be used in weapons; and (3) impose a ban on importing, purchasing, acquiring or shipping any and all Russian arms, ammunition and other weapons, including hunting knives and air rifles into Canada.
